About this test domain

About VLSI PD Lab (.site)

This test site is intentionally structured differently from the main `.top` site. It is optimized for fast loading, concise study sessions, and centralized metadata through Eleventy.

Why this version exists

The `.site` domain is used to test a lighter information architecture, centralized SEO, and a content model that is easier to maintain than many standalone HTML files.

What is different from `.top`

  • Guide + track navigation instead of mirrored long-form pages
  • Different titles, descriptions, and editorial summaries
  • Minimal CSS and no heavy front-end JavaScript
  • Eleventy-generated sitemap and canonical URLs from one layout

SEO note

Keep one domain as the primary production site. The `.site` version is a test bed for structure, speed, and metadata consistency.

VLSI PD Lab is a lightweight lab-style reference for VLSI physical design learning.

Built for the `.site` test domain with different structure and metadata from the `.top` site.
